text:
Jay dan Euijoo memang tidak begitu dekat, Jay agak terkejut saat Euijoo menghampirinya untuk mengucapkan selamat tinggal.
"Ah yang calon istri CEO mah beda ya" goda Euijoo.
Jay hanya terkekeh kecil, menghela nafas saat barangnya sudah selesai ia masukan kedalam kotak.
"Ya udah temen-temen, terimakasih ya udah jadi temen baik aku selama kerja disini. Aku pamit sekarang" Jay tersenyum simpul.
"Iya sama-sama, semoga nanti kita ketemu lagi ya Jay" ucap Euijoo ramah.
Jay mengangguk kuat, beralih pada Sunoo yang masih menangis tersedu-sedu.
Grep
"Jaaaayyyy~ Jangan pergi~" Sunoo memeluk Jay erat.
"Sunoo, kan masih banyak temen kamu disini. Jangan sedih ya? Ada Euijoo juga kan, kamu bisa ajak dia ngeteh tiap pagi. Yakan Euijoo?"
trans:
Jay and Euijoo weren’t that close, so Jay was a bit surprised when Euijoo came over to say goodbye.
“Ah, it’s different when it’s the future wife of the CEO,” Euijoo teased.
Jay just chuckled softly and sighed as he finished packing his things into a box.
"Alright, everyone, thanks for being such great friends while I've been working here. I'm saying goodbye now," Jay said with a faint smile.
“Yeah, same here. I hope we run into each other again, Jay,” Euijoo replied kindly.
Jay nodded firmly and turned to Sunoo, who was still crying softly.
Grep
“Jaaaayyyy~ Don’t go~” Sunoo hugged Jay tightly.
“Sunoo, you still have plenty of friends here. Don’t be sad, okay? Euijoo is here too, so you can invite him for tea every morning. Right, Euijoo?”
